attributes.comment:
I am currently on H1B visa and have cleared my I-140 and waiting for my priority
date to become current. My friends and I have done Master in US and would like
to settle down here.
My position on this proposed rule is one of hearty approval.
1. For the wonderful service that you provide I sometimes wonder how an
organization could do that with the limited fees that you charge.
2. I think that its a privilege for the immigrants to come to this country. I
woudnt want you to get funding from the tax payers money as its not right for
the tax payers to foot the bill for non citizens aspiring to come to this country.
3. With this additional fees I am sure that you will provide a better service to
the potential immigrants, as you are the first US agency that they come in
contact with and I would like them to have a good first impression of this great
country.

For this above reasons I wish you the best of luck in getting this rule approved.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Gaurau Girish
